data.oai_dc:dc: SBCLTER: Land: Hydrology: Stream Discharge and associated parameters at Devereaux Creek at Slough inflow (DV01)

Stream Discharge and water temperature were collected with a Solinst Model 3001 LT Levelogger at Devereaux Creek at Slough inflow in the Santa Barbara coastal area (site ID: DV01). Data are reported hourly. Stage values were converted to discharge using a rating curve developed with stream channel cross-sections, roughness estimates and the HEC-RAS model.
